articles.description: Google Fi is adding three new Motorola phones to its offerings: the One 5G Ace, Moto G Power, and Moto G Play. Each offers a 5,000mAh battery and is available directly through the MVNO.
articles.content:
Googles MVNO is now offering three new budget-friendly Motorola devices
The Motorola One 5G Ace is now available for sale through Googles MVNO.
Photo by Allison Johnson / The Verge

articles.title: Shareit Android app has several security flaws, reports TrendMicro - MobiGyaan
articles.description: Trend Micro, a security firm claims that it has found "several" security flaws in the ShareIt application, which is a popular application for sharing files between devices. The app has been downloaded more than a billion times from the Play Store.As

articles.title: Nokia 5.4 available in India for ₹13,999 - Nokiamob
articles.description: Nokia 5.4 is a well thought through midrange Nokia smartphone that is now available as 4/64GB model in India for ₹13,999.

articles.title: Asus ROG Phone 5 India Launch Tipped for March - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Asus ROG Phone 5 India launch will take place in March, a tipster has claimed on Twitter. The new gaming phone is speculated to come as a successor to the Asus ROG Phone 3 and carry Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 SoC.
